title: 港人破坏何君尧办公室，这是正当的公民反恐
contents:
何君尧议员抱怨说：自己的办公室第三次被破坏，甚至没有保险公司愿意提供保险。然而，港人毁坏何君尧财产，针对的是恐怖分子领袖，而非像杨佳那样针对无关警员。法律不但不追究元朗恐袭，反而迫害恐袭受害者，新的恐袭还在发生，恐怖分子射穿记者眼球、枪击学生胸膛。因此，在法律回归之前，港人执行公民反恐，以保护自己和孩子免遭谋杀，是可以理解的。

Ho Kwan Yiu complains his office was damaged for a 3rd time and no company would insure it. But Hongkongers were justified in doing so because the law refuses to punish this terrorist leader for the part he played in Yuen Long & other attacks but persecutes the victims. Hongkongers have the right to defend themselves & their kids from Ho Kwan Yiu & other terrorists. With terrorist bullets ceaselessly penetrating eyes & chests, such civil counter-terrorism efforts will always be justified until the law returns with protection & justice.
